articles.title: Is Jayson Tatum practicing with Celtics teammates? Latest social media post seems to indicate as much
articles.description:
Tatum practiced with the Maine Celtics earlier in February.

The post Is Jayson Tatum practicing with Celtics teammates? Latest social media post seems to indicate as much appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jayson Tatum practiced with the Maine Celtics earlier in February.
His recent social media post suggests he is training with teammates.
Tatum's return could boost Celtics' performance for Boston fans.

articles.title: NBC Sports broadcast teams rise to the occasion with Olympic calls from Milan Cortina
articles.description:
Kenny Albert and A.J. Mleczko nailed it for the network at the conclusion of Team USA's win in women's hockey, and Terry Gannon, Tara Lipinski, and Johnny Weir let Alysa Liu's gold-medal figure skating speak for itself.

The post NBC Sports broadcast teams rise to the occasion with Olympic calls from Milan Cortina appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kenny Albert and A.J. Mleczko covered Team USA's women's hockey victory at the Olympics.
Terry Gannon, Tara Lipinski, and Johnny Weir highlighted Alysa Liu's gold medal in figure skating.
Boston residents can enjoy enhanced Olympic coverage through NBC Sports' local broadcast teams.

articles.title: Free MBTA bus program extended — for now
articles.description:
Three Boston bus routes will continue offering free rides through June, but the program’s future remains uncertain.

The post Free MBTA bus program extended — for now appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Free rides on three Boston bus routes extended through June 2024.
MBTA's decision impacts local commuters relying on these routes for transportation.
Future of the free bus program remains uncertain beyond June.

articles.title: Snow totals: See how much snow your town got
articles.description:
Get ready for some more snow on Sunday into Monday.

summary: Boston residents can expect additional snow from Sunday into Monday.
Previous snow totals varied across towns, affecting local travel conditions.
Prepare for potential disruptions in public services and commuting due to snow.

articles.title: She’s running the 2026 Boston Marathon for the 2013 bombing victims
articles.description:
"I’ll never forget that day and how my heart has ached for them ever since."

The post She’s running the 2026 Boston Marathon for the 2013 bombing victims appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Local runner honors 2013 bombing victims by participating in the 2026 Boston Marathon.
She expresses ongoing emotional connection to the victims since the tragic event.
Her run aims to raise awareness and support for the affected families in Boston.

articles.title: NH man sentenced for using $1M in COVID relief funds to buy golf course
articles.description:
Michael Kirouac will serve 15 months in prison after pleading guilty in October.

The post NH man sentenced for using $1M in COVID relief funds to buy golf course appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Michael Kirouac sentenced to 15 months for misusing $1M COVID relief funds.
Funds were intended for struggling businesses, impacting local economic recovery efforts.
Sentencing highlights ongoing scrutiny of COVID relief fund misuse in New England.

articles.title: Man with 25-year record charged in high-end Boston shoplifting spree
articles.description:
Prosecutors say the suspect is a “common and notorious thief.”

The post Man with 25-year record charged in high-end Boston shoplifting spree appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Man with 25-year criminal record charged for high-end shoplifting in Boston.
Suspect's spree involved thefts from multiple luxury retailers, raising security concerns.
Prosecutors label him a 'common and notorious thief,' impacting local businesses.
